timeline.message: fix(TUP-29693): Fix migrating jarname to maven uri if jar name contains context

timeline.bodyText:
why need execute migrateProjectSettings in the loop ?
It will try to check the project migration many times . It should be a one time check migration.
timeline.author: wchen-talend

replies.bodyText: I think UpdateModuleListInComponentsMigrationTask.java  should keep the main logic the same as before . but only add the check for context mode in module list .
replies.author: wchen-talend
